points: Led several key initiatives including web accessibility, communicative documentation, promotion security, test standards, and team unification.
Wrote automation scripts to enhance testing workflow and improve performance.
Collaborated with web developers to identify and resolve issues during the implementation phase.
Facilitated the implementation of new technologies, bridging the gap between product owners and developers.
Streamline operations to minimize issues, particularly during crucial, high-traffic periods.
Helped the UGG team to significantly increase the Quality and Security without a reduction in efficiency by embracing Quality Practices.
